name: Daniel Koryat
title: Backend Web Developer & AWS Cloud Specialist
subtitle: Building scalable AI-powered systems with Python, FastAPI, and AWS
description: Backend Web Developer specializing in Python/FastAPI, AWS cloud services, and AI/ML systems. Currently developing AI-powered backend platforms with microservices architecture.
intro: I'm Danielâ€”a Python/FastAPI backend specialist currently developing AI-powered systems for Sidekick Wellness. I build scalable microservices on AWS, implement RAG systems with LangChain, and optimize performance with Redis caching strategies.

experience.title: Backend Web Developer
experience.description: Developing AI-powered backend platform with microservices architecture
achievements: Built scalable microservices architecture for AI backend platform
Implemented RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems using LangChain and Pinecone
Optimized performance with Redis caching strategies
Managed AWS infrastructure using Terraform for Infrastructure as Code
Collaborated with distributed teams across U.S. and India
Integrated multiple data sources for comprehensive AI training

projects.title: Sidekick Wellness AI Backend Platform
projects.description: AI-powered backend platform with RAG systems and microservices architecture
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive AI backend platform that leverages Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to provide intelligent responses. Built with microservices architecture for scalability, featuring Redis caching for performance optimization and AWS infrastructure managed through Terraform. The platform integrates multiple data sources and provides real-time AI-powered insights for wellness applications.

projects.title: Microservices API Gateway
projects.description: High-performance API gateway for distributed microservices
projects.longDescription: Designed and implemented a scalable API gateway that routes requests to multiple microservices. Features include authentication, rate limiting, request/response transformation, and comprehensive monitoring with OpenTelemetry. Built with FastAPI and deployed on AWS using containerized services.

projects.title: RAG System with Vector Database
projects.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation system using Pinecone and LangChain
projects.longDescription: Implemented a sophisticated RAG system that combines document retrieval with generative AI. Uses Pinecone vector database for efficient similarity search and LangChain for orchestrating the AI pipeline. Features include document ingestion, embedding generation, semantic search, and context-aware response generation.

education.description: Intensive programming bootcamp covering full-stack development, databases, and modern web technologies
Comprehensive introduction to computer science and programming fundamentals
AWS Cloud Practitioner certification covering core AWS services and cloud concepts
